summary: The Hospital Adoption Education Act of 2025 aims to improve understanding and support for adoption within the healthcare industry. It directs the Secretary of Health and Human Services to develop and disseminate resources regarding adoption sensitivities in healthcare, best practices for interacting with expectant and adoptive families, and online adoption resources for healthcare workers. The Secretary is required to provide education and professional development to healthcare providers, and may do so through grants and contracts with eligible organizations. The bill also defines key terms and authorizes $5 million in appropriations for fiscal years 2026-2029.
